We believe that cannabis has the power to change millions of lives. In a sea of sketchy websites and out of touch companies, Herb stands out as an authentic and tasteful brand for cannabis enthusiasts. We are for those who are passionate about cannabis. Herb is a community for cannabis consumers by cannabis consumers. At Herb, we are a community and we take pride in the fact that you belong to that community. It's a place to laugh. It's a place to find inspiration. It's a place to learn. It's a place where you belong. We want you to be able to connect with other cannabis enthusiasts to share your experiences and add humanity to cannabis use. In our community everyone should feel respected and safe. We have some new community guidelines to ensure this is upheld. We have created a cult following over the past 8 years, originating from The Stoner's Cookbook. We are the OG's of cannabis and have a community of over 14 million loyal followers. We are here to define the next evolution of cannabis. We're thrilled to have you onboard this wild ride. Our Mission We are here to spread good vibes. We are for those that view cannabis as more than a hobby and less than an obsession. We view cannabis like many view coffee - it is part of an otherwise vibrant life. Herb is ushering in a new era of cannabis culture, an approachable experience that will define the next evolution of this industry.
